DOC.brief_summary: The primary endpoint of this study is to assess the objective tumor response rate in patients with advanced epithelial ovarian cancer receiving combination of Gemcitabine at a dose 1250 mg/m2 (Day 1 and 8) with Cisplatin 75 mg/m2 (Day 1) as first-line treatment
DOC.criteria: ECOG = 02 Operated patients disease stage IIIIV No prior chemotherapy or radiation therapy
